alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fond du Lac (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 2:10PM CDT until April 19 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Fond du Lac County in east central Wisconsin... Northwestern Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 210 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Randolph, or 8 miles northwest of Beaver Dam, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Beaver Dam, Waupun, Oakfield, Burnett, Fox Lake, Kekoskee, South Beaver Dam, Atwater, Astico, and Oak Center. This includes the following Location Horicon Marsh. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
